content:
/>
VIII.iv.6.B.5.b
.
Entitlement to 1151 Compensation vs. Service Connection
Although compensation or DIC is payable under
38 U.S.C. 1151
as if the additional disability or death were SC, the additional disability or death is
not
actually SC.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B - Rating Claims Filed Under 38 U.S.C. 1151
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 6, Section B
